019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager;
020
021import com.google.gson.Gson;
022import freemarker.template.Configuration;
023import freemarker.template.TemplateException;
024import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
025import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1APIService;
026import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ObjectMeta;
027import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesObject;
028import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.Dynamics;
029import java.io.IOException;
030import java.io.StringWriter;
031import java.util.Collections;
032import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
033import java.util.Map;
034import java.util.Optional;
035import java.util.logging.Logger;
036import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sV1ServiceStub;
037import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.VmDefinition;
038import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmChannel;
039import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmDefChanged;
040import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.DataPath;
041import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.GsonPtr;
042import org.yaml.snakeyaml.LoaderOptions;
043import org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml;
044import org.yaml.snakeyaml.constructor.SafeConstructor;
045
046/**
047 * Delegee for reconciling the service
048 */
049@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
050/* default */ class LoadBalancerReconciler {
051
052    private static final String LOAD_BALANCER_SERVICE = "loadBalancerService";
053    private static final String METADATA
054        = V1APIService.SERIALIZED_NAME_METADATA;
055    private static final String LABELS = V1ObjectMeta.SERIALIZED_NAME_LABELS;
056    private static final String ANNOTATIONS
057        = V1ObjectMeta.SERIALIZED_NAME_ANNOTATIONS;
058    protected final Logger logger = Logger.getLogger(getClass().getName());
059    private final Configuration fmConfig;
060
061    /**
062     * Instantiates a new service reconciler.
063     *
064     * @param fmConfig the fm config
065     */
066    public LoadBalancerReconciler(Configuration fmConfig) {
067        this.fmConfig = fmConfig;
068    }
069
070    /**
071     * Reconcile.
072     *
073     * @param event the event
074     * @param model the model
075     * @param channel the channel
076     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
077     * @throws TemplateException the template exception
078     * @throws ApiException the api exception
079     */
080    public void reconcile(VmDefChanged event,
081            Map<String, Object> model, VmChannel channel)
082            throws IOException, TemplateException, ApiException {
083        // Check if to be generated
084        @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals", "unchecked" })
085        var lbsDef = Optional.of(model)
086            .map(m -> (Map<String, Object>) m.get("reconciler"))
087            .map(c -> c.get(LOAD_BALANCER_SERVICE)).orElse(Boolean.FALSE);
088        if (!(lbsDef instanceof Map) && !(lbsDef instanceof Boolean)) {
089            logger.warning(() -> "\"" + LOAD_BALANCER_SERVICE
090                + "\" in configuration must be boolean or mapping but is "
091                + lbsDef.getClass() + ".");
092            return;
093        }
094        if (lbsDef instanceof Boolean isOn && !isOn) {
095            return;
096        }
097
098        // Load balancer can also be turned off for VM
099        var vmDef = event.vmDefinition();
100        if (DataPath.<Map<String, Map<String, String>>> get(vmDef, "spec",
101            LOAD_BALANCER_SERVICE).map(m -> m.isEmpty()).orElse(false)) {
102            return;
103        }
104
105        // Combine template and data and parse result
106        var fmTemplate = fmConfig.getTemplate("runnerLoadBalancer.ftl.yaml");
107        StringWriter out = new StringWriter();
108        fmTemplate.process(model, out);
109        // Avoid Yaml.load due to
110        // https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/issues/2741
111        var svcDef = Dynamics.newFromYaml(
112            new Yaml(new SafeConstructor(new LoaderOptions())), out.toString());
113        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
114        var defaults = lbsDef instanceof Map
115            ? (Map<String, Map<String, String>>) lbsDef
116            : null;
117        var client = channel.client();
118        mergeMetadata(client.getJSON().getGson(), svcDef, defaults, vmDef);
119
120        // Apply
121        var svcStub = K8sV1ServiceStub
122            .get(client, vmDef.namespace(), vmDef.name());
123        if (svcStub.apply(svcDef).isEmpty()) {
124            logger.warning(
125                () -> "Could not patch service for " + svcStub.name());
126        }
127    }
128
129    private void mergeMetadata(Gson gson, DynamicKubernetesObject svcDef,
130            Map<String, Map<String, String>> defaults,
131            VmDefinition vmDefinition) {
132        // Get specific load balancer metadata from VM definition
133        var vmLbMeta = DataPath
134            .<Map<String, Map<String, String>>> get(vmDefinition, "spec",
135                LOAD_BALANCER_SERVICE)
136            .orElse(Collections.emptyMap());
137
138        // Merge
139        var svcMeta = svcDef.getMetadata();
140        var svcJsonMeta = GsonPtr.to(svcDef.getRaw()).to(METADATA);
141        Optional.ofNullable(mergeIfAbsent(svcMeta.getLabels(),
142            mergeReplace(defaults.get(LABELS), vmLbMeta.get(LABELS))))
143            .ifPresent(lbls -> svcJsonMeta.set(LABELS, gson.toJsonTree(lbls)));
144        Optional.ofNullable(mergeIfAbsent(svcMeta.getAnnotations(),
145            mergeReplace(defaults.get(ANNOTATIONS), vmLbMeta.get(ANNOTATIONS))))
146            .ifPresent(as -> svcJsonMeta.set(ANNOTATIONS, gson.toJsonTree(as)));
147    }
148
149    private Map<String, String> mergeReplace(Map<String, String> dest,
150            Map<String, String> src) {
151        if (src == null) {
152            return dest;
153        }
154        if (dest == null) {
155            dest = new LinkedHashMap<>();
156        } else {
157            dest = new LinkedHashMap<>(dest);
158        }
159        for (var e : src.entrySet()) {
160            if (e.getValue() == null) {
161                dest.remove(e.getKey());
162                continue;
163            }
164            dest.put(e.getKey(), e.getValue());
165        }
166        return dest;
167    }
168
169    private Map<String, String> mergeIfAbsent(Map<String, String> dest,
170            Map<String, String> src) {
171        if (src == null) {
172            return dest;
173        }
174        if (dest == null) {
175            dest = new LinkedHashMap<>();
176        } else {
177            dest = new LinkedHashMap<>(dest);
178        }
179        for (var e : src.entrySet()) {
180            if (dest.containsKey(e.getKey())) {
181                continue;
182            }
183            dest.put(e.getKey(), e.getValue());
184        }
185        return dest;
186    }
187
188}
